overview: Recorded under the Hyperion Bridge and at the surrounding Los Angeles River in LA California, Echolocations: River is second in a series of short films and recordings which document site specific compositions performed by Andrew Bird in exceptional natural and urban environments. A Companion piece to Bird's instrumental album of the same name.
tagline: Whatever sound you make it's like a giant limb that can reach beyond your fingers and grope the corners of the room.
title: Echolocations: River
